requirements.iso_principle: Top of screen at or slightly below eye level (neutral neck).
Maintain 50 cm to 100 cm distance from eyes.
Height must align with resting elbow height (90°-120° angle).
Adequate clearance for thighs and movement.
Seat depth must allow space between the edge and the back of the knee (approx. 5cm).

correction_guidance.MonitorHeight_Low: Raise the monitor using a stand or adjustable arm to bring the screen top to eye level.
correction_guidance.MonitorHeight_High: Lower the monitor and/or raise your chair/desk height to align with a neutral neck.
correction_guidance.ElbowSupport_Low: Raise your chair height until your elbows are at desk level, or use a keyboard tray.
correction_guidance.ElbowSupport_High: Lower your desk or chair height; your shoulders appear hunched to reach the keyboard.
